title: A Career in commercial television
creator_credit: Tony Wellington and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Looks at the administrative, engineering and production aspects of commercial television, concentrating in particular on production. Stresses the limited opportunities available in this field and how most people in production commence work at the bottom rung of the production ladder. Narrated by Roger Climpson. Suitable for secondary school level.
